enemies.name: Goblin Scout
enemies.description: A small, wiry creature with sharp teeth and cunning eyes. It watches your every move.

enemies.name: Skeleton Warrior
enemies.description: Bones held together by dark magic. It raises its rusted blade with mechanical precision.

enemies.name: Giant Rat
enemies.description: A rat the size of a dog, with yellowed fangs dripping with disease.

enemies.name: Dark Mage
enemies.description: A hooded figure crackling with dark energy. Shadows coil around its gnarled fingers.

enemies.name: Giant Spider
enemies.description: A monstrous arachnid the size of a horse. Its many eyes gleam with predatory hunger, and venom drips from its fangs.

enemies.name: Lake Guardian
enemies.description: An ancient water elemental bound to protect the lake island. Its form shifts constantly between waves and mist, and its touch is freezing cold.

enemies.name: Stone Golem
enemies.description: A hulking construct of animated stone. Each step shakes the ground.

enemies.name: Dungeon Warlord
enemies.description: The master of this dungeon, a towering figure clad in black armor. His eyes burn with centuries of hatred.

enemies.name: Mimic
enemies.description: What appeared to be a chest reveals rows of teeth and a long, slavering tongue!

enemies.name: Frozen Knight
enemies.description: A warrior encased in ice, still moving with jerky, mechanical motions. Frost crackles from every joint, and its frozen blade gleams with deadly cold.

enemies.name: Ice Wraith
enemies.description: A spirit of pure cold, barely visible except for the frost that forms in its wake. Its touch freezes flesh and shatters bone.

enemies.name: Cave Crawler
enemies.description: A pale, eyeless creature that skitters across walls and ceilings. Its long claws click against stone as it circles you hungrily.

enemies.name: Undead Miner
enemies.description: A skeletal figure still clutching its pickaxe, driven by an endless compulsion to dig. Its hollow eyes glow with purple light from the corrupted ore.

enemies.name: Temple Guardian
enemies.description: An ancient construct of obsidian and gold, awakened to defend the buried temple. Symbols of power pulse across its surface, and its eyes burn with eldritch fire.

enemies.name: Void Spawn
enemies.description: A creature from beyond reality, its form constantly shifting between shapes that hurt to perceive. Where it moves, existence itself seems to fray.

enemies.name: Spider Queen
enemies.description: The massive matriarch of the dungeon's spider population. Her carapace gleams like polished obsidian, and venom drips from fangs the size of daggers. Thousands of eyes watch you with cold intelligence.

enemies.name: Spectral Chef
enemies.description: The ghost of the dungeon's head cook, still wearing a bloodstained apron. Spectral knives orbit around it, and its hollow eyes blaze with fury at the interruption.

enemies.name: Bone Collector
enemies.description: A hunched figure assembled from mismatched bones, constantly adding to itself from the ossuary's walls. Extra arms sprout from its back, all reaching, all grasping.

enemies.name: Bone Colossus
enemies.description: A giant constructed from thousands of bones, fused together by dark magic. Multiple skulls form a crown atop its massive frame, each screaming silently. It towers above you, death given terrible form.

enemies.name: Failed Experiment
enemies.description: Once human, now something else entirely. Its body is a patchwork of flesh and machinery, alchemy and agony. It moves in jerks and spasms, driven by pain and hunger.

enemies.name: Vault Guardian
enemies.description: An elite skeletal warrior clad in golden armor, sworn to protect the Warlord's treasure for eternity. Blue flames burn in its eye sockets, and its blade has never known defeat.
